law.full_text:
CLEARING CROSSINGS.
After having entered any highway crossing, any steam, diesel or gasoline-propelled railroad train, car or rolling equipment shall be so operated as to clear such crossing for longitudinal highway traffic as quickly as practicable, consistent with the speed limits prescribed by law.
law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
CLEARING CROSSINGS. (§ 72.10.1)
CLEARING CROSSINGS. After having entered any highway crossing, any steam, diesel or gasoline-propelled railroad train, car or rolling equipment shall be so operated as to clear such crossing for longitudinal highway traffic as quickly as practicable, consistent with the speed limits prescribed by law.
